app_name: Joy Launcher â€“ Best & Free Launcher for Android
app_detail:
Joy Launcher is the best a personalized and cool home launcher for Android. It has Smart Center which shows the Weather, Exchange, Calendar, Note for you, keeps your phone in the best condition by Fast Phone Booster, Smart Battery Saver, Quickly Search, and App Drawer Widgets. Besides, Joy Launcher for free offers your variety of amazing theme and wallpapers. Come and enjoy it!

Main Features:

Super Privacy Space & Hide your Apps

Joy Launcher is one of the top safe launcher apps for Android. It implemented the latest security technologies, protects your data in high-level. Hide apps which were never used or some you don't want to be discovered. Swipe up with two fingers on the home screen and select the secret app you want to add. 

Make Phone Faster by Powerful Features

Boost your Android phone memory without downloading extra apps. Joy Launcher can improve your phoneâ€™s performances by Fast Phone Booster, Super Junk Cleaner, Powerful CPU Cooler and Smart Battery Saver. 
* Optimize the technology so that you can switch animations more smoothly, complete the task quietly and quickly.
* Using Phone Booster for the first time will increase speed by 80%, clean up large files and caches that are not commonly used efficiently. 
* Smart Battery Saver monitoring of app battery consumption & CPU situation in real-time, and will remind you smartly when necessary.


Personalized Widget Drawer
Swipe left the home screen to open Smart Center. Joy Launcher app provides Weather, Calculator, Exchange, Notes and Favourites Widgets to make a best Android launcher and an easy to used 3rd party launcher. 
* Get the real-time weather and exchange without spending extra time to find this information, these data will be updated every hour.
* Put your most used apps under the Favorite widgets, you can customize the order or remove them depending on your preference.
* Long press on the home screen, you will be able to open the Widget Drawer directly, all widgets are grouped by apps to make you use it much faster.

Universal Search With Gesture

Swipe up on the screen with one finger, and the search bar will pop up immediately. Joy Launcher supports gesture operation to make you enjoy the fast searching experience. When you entering keywords about apps name, pictures, videos, contacts, SMS and webs, the result will appear quickly. Joy Launcher, the best Android launcher, also supports network search and internal search of mobile phones to make searching more precise. By the way, you also can get the hot search keyword in case of missing the hot spot of the moment.

Full of Variety Theme Center

Resize your home screen layout. Joy Launcher for free offers your new free stylish & beautiful launcher themes and wallpapers with a very wide selection. Simplify your phone with the most advanced and fully customizable ever!
* Get thousands of choices of cool launcher theme, bring you a new home screen to customize it, you can change icons, layouts, animations and more. 
* Switch any HD wallpapers as you like, including beauty, pet, anime, Disney, and the great landscape from all over the world. 

Helpful Operation Tips: 

Hide apps: swipe up with two fingers on the home screen.
Search quickly: swipe up with one finger on the home screen.
Navigate to the setting: long press on an empty space on the home screen.
Create a folder: long press the icon and drag it onto another icon.
Remove apps: long press on the icon and drop to the top of the screen.

What are you waiting for? Download Joy Launcher, the best 3rd party launcher for Android and share with your friends! If you ğŸ’• us, donâ€™t forget to get a rating â­for us!
